元より稀少ではあったが、この数年は特に《ブラッ
ドオーブ》が減っている。《ブラッドオーブ》が無け
れば白竜の石化は進むばかりだ

　探索の人員と機会を少しでも増やすようにレオ並び
にゲルトには依頼済みだ。わたしも覚者たちにはひと
声かけるようにしている

　一方で、《ブラッドオーブ》に頼らず白竜の回復を
促す方法を探そうという動きがある。提唱者はレオ
だ

　彼は古文書に答えを探すつもりらしい。何か方策が
見つかれば良いが、古文書の内容は玉石混淆。研究に
習熟した者でなければ単なる思いつきの記述を信じ、
無駄な時間や犠牲を払うことになるだろう

　入手した古文書の解析はクラウスに命じたようだ
が、まだまだ未熟者。しっかりと指導してやらねば
new:
Originally, it was rare, but in recent years, the number of Blood Orbs has been decreasing. If there are no Blood Orbs, the petrification of the White Dragon will only continue to progress.

I have already requested Leo and Gerd to increase the number of exploration personnel and opportunities. I am also making sure to reach out to the Arisen.

On the other hand, there is a movement to find a way to promote the recovery of the White Dragon without relying on Blood Orbs. The proponent is Leo.

He seems to be intending to find the answers in ancient documents. It would be good if some strategies were found, but the content of the ancient documents is a mix of gems and stones. If one is not proficient in research, they may believe it to be just a whimsical description and waste time and sacrifice in vain.

It seems that Klaus has been ordered to analyze the obtained ancient documents, but he is still inexperienced. I need to give him proper guidance.
